name: CreateDashboard
description:
Create a new dashboard for a specified project.

Use this tool to create a new dashboard in a specified project. This can be helpful when you need to set up dashboards to monitor or visualize project data.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the project for which you want to create the dashboard. Retrieve this ID by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: output_format
parameters.description: Specify the format of the dashboard creation response. Options are 'json' or 'txt'.

parameters.name: dashboard_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing dashboard specifications like name, description, tags, tiles, etc.

user_access_level.description: The effective access level the user has for this object

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

user_access_level.description: The effective access level the user has for this object
